segments.text: I'm shocked by how unaware everyone seems here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's on, sink full, water cascading over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, foot in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks calm, no idea of the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, stool tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That could be dangerous, he might topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's below, arm out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating quietly, mom none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing, cabinets wet, floor hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden outside looks idyllic, inside all amiss.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such mischief in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hope they don't make noise and alert her.
segments.speaker: PAR
